title: New free champion rotation: Annie, Graves, Trundle and more!

replies.body: Where do cats fight? The cat arena! get it? katarina
Looks like we have some {{champion:63}} new puns... it'll be {{champion:98}} sational to hear some more.  That first one was a {{champion:57}} thful.
whats the {{champion:57}} thful maokaithful?
upvoted. you deserve more upvotes.{{champion:55}}

{{champion:102}}

Mmmm....interesting.
poor {{champion:102}} has to fight while being pregnant {{item:3070}}
I swear, if {{champion:102}} starts to have her baby (babies?) whilst she's battling... GOSH DARN IT JARVAN

There are loads of side affects that might come along if she fights while pregnant. Stress, medication, physical exertion, and magical dragon transformations every few minutes can have unexpected and drastic changes on the unborn child(ren).
In other words, her child(ren) might have a minor case of serious brain damage.
And that why she not fighting during her pregnancy
Lol Portal reference!

i only upvoted because of supports
Trundle makes 40% more trolls. Well, better nerf Irelia.
...That was actually perfect. XD
Woah, most of them are 450 IP...
Two of them are 450. And one of those two is currently getting some of the highest win-rates in league.
3 {{champion:1}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:16}}
Wait they are all 450 now i feel cheated out my ip ww was 3150 and raka was 1350 same with annie i want it back
wrong,ww was 1350 ip but after lissandra came out he went to being 450ip
This is truely bananas...
Oh. Soraka was 1350 when I bought her.
does anyone have the feeling that braum keeps getting repeated in the rotation?
Yeah, him and Graves. Graves was the first champ I bought, sometime back in August I think, and I've seen him on the rotation something like five times since then...
And Urgot...
Soooo whens {{champion:55}}  gonna get nerfed riot? and why does it say she's hard to play, its basically face rolling when you play her
Its called cc. If you can just stun her when she is ulting or silence her she is useless already. Soraka has an aoe silence and a root. Use that when kat ults and she is dead.

There are only 6 champs left with a silence because Rito thinks they are bad (yet reksai gets harder cc...){{champion:53}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:16}} So yeah IF you are playing one of them you can silence her...
Silencing isn't the only way to stop her. Stunning works. Knocking back, aside, or up will work too.
lol you not read the patch notes? the did a nerf on her ult last time, not huge but she can't blow you up instantly early game anymore
Kat on free champ? oh no were all dead now.
time to rip apart some noobs then

One word.

{{champion:90}}
{{champion:55}}  is on free rotation? Well I guess I'm not playing mid lane for the next week.
just play kassadin and rek her she hits r you q and she is dead

I get it.
But the joke makes me sad more than laugh.
RIP Silence 2014
Not a joke m8. Q interrupts her R.
